body.name: DRMTLGY Gentle Acne Face Wash - Acne Cleanser & Facial Wash - Oil-Free Salicylic Acid Cleanser & Face Wash for Acne
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 10% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 13 mins
features: Powerful Acne Fighter: The DRMTLGY cleanser face wash contains Salicylic Acid 2%, a potent multi-purpose ingredient that is clinically proven to treat the fundamental causes of acne. 16 nourishing botanicals help the salicylic acid face wash to clear existing acne and prevent future breakouts without over-drying your skin.
Absorbs Excess Oil: This oil-free acne cleanser absorbs excess oil, leaves no residue, and is perfect to use with the rest of the DRMT anti-acne regimen.
Gentle, But Effective Cleansing: The face wash for acne is designed to effortlessly remove makeup, oil and dirt without harsh ingredients that strip your skin.

Clean Formula Made in the USA: Our facial cleansers are cruelty free and suitable for all skin types. All DRMTLGY face washes are formulated with you in mind right here in the USA to give you highest quality skincare products available.
How to Use: Apply face cleanser over wet face and work into lather. Rinse with water and pat dry. Can be used twice daily or as directed by a physician.
body.description: DRMTLGY acne cleanser uses a unique blend of Salicylic Acid 2%, a powerful acne-fighting ingredient, and 16 nourishing botanicals to clear existing acne and prevent future breakouts without over-drying your skin. The acne wash for face features an oil-free formula that absorbs excess oil, leaves no residue, and is perfect to use with the rest of our acne regimen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product & smells so good
reviews.reviewText: I really like this face wash and it smells so good. I’ve only been using it a few days but have seen a difference in my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice light scent. Leaves your skin feeling fresh. No harsh drying effect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! No more cystic acne!
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually write reviews, but I cannot rave enough about this product. Ever since the birth of my son I've battled with cystic acne. I've gone through two rounds of Accutane and it still came back years later. I had been going to the dermatologist every time I had a break out to get injections into the painful swollen area as that was the only way to make the cystic acne go away. In addition to being painful, it was really expensive going to the dermatologist all the time. I stumbled across this product while searching for a solution to having to go to the dr all the time. Within two weeks my skin was completely clear - it was a miracle. I've been using it for three months now and it has completely prevented the painful cystic acne breakouts. I've found that it works best if I use two pumps of the DRMTLGY product mixed well with one pump of Cetaphil in the palm of my hand and then apply it like a paste on my face and gently massage it into my skin so it really gets into my pores. It smells good too, not medicinal at all. I cannot say enough good things about this product! TRY IT, you won't regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This could be the cleanser I have been looking for
reviews.reviewText: I use it at night on my face before bed ,only need a little to get the job done. Face feels nice and clean after using, so far not drying it out either. Only been a few days so hopefully it will keep the acne away because I do like the product. rated 4 stars since I haven't used it very long..so far so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can’t rate this highly enough
reviews.reviewText: Seriously the best face wash I’ve come across. My skin has never felt so soft and clean! Feels very light, not greasy or heavy. Felt like it brought out the best in my skin after just one wash- I’ll be trying out more of their products now!! I have acne prone skin, so I’ll be excited to see how this clears things up over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: I usually like DRMTGLY products but this one was weird. It’s a weird consistency like a thick gel and no matter how I scrubbed I just don’t feel like it cleaned my skin. It also feels like it leaves a film as well. I do not think it did anything to help my acne either. Better/cheaper alternatives out from Inky List and the Ordinary

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love your products the best.
reviews.reviewText: My skin so much better now. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does exactly what it says
reviews.reviewText: This stuff really works!! Not that expensive and believe me my grandson had tried EVERYTHING. HIGH DOLLAR CREAM,FACIALS YOU NAME IT. IT'S IMPORTANT WHEN THEY TURN 13 not to have acne. I simply couldn't get over it. I bought the face wash also, not only did it clear everything up but keeps it clear. Strongly recommend this.
